<title level="1" pfs="">[Shanrigol Heap](/Monsters.aspx?ID=1050)</title>

<row gap="medium">

<column gap="medium" flex="1 1 400px">

The most basic and common type of shanrigol is called, based on its general shape, a shanrigol heap. These amalgamations of warped flesh and shattered bone establish hunting grounds by accident rather than design, remaining where prey has been plentiful in the past so they can grow larger and larger as they add to their jumbled forms. Only rare fleshwarpers create these abominations willingly, as they ignore all commands and containment to seek out prey.

<trait label="Medium" />
<trait label="Aberration" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=1" />
<trait label="Undead" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=160" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Pathfinder #164: Hands of the Devil](/Sources.aspx?ID=75) pg. 84</row>

**Perception** +9; [darkvision](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=12), [tremorsense](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=40) (imprecise) 30 feet

**Languages**

**Skills**
[Athletics](/Skills.aspx?ID=3) +12, [Stealth](/Skills.aspx?ID=15) +10

<row gap="medium">
**Str** +5

**Dex** +2

**Con** +3

**Int** -4

**Wis** +1

**Cha** -5
</row>

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="medium">
**AC** 20 [all-around vision](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=1)

**Fort** +14 

**Ref** +11 

**Will** +9 

</row>

**HP** 55
([negative healing](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=42))

**Immunities**
[death](/Traits.aspx?ID=40) effects, [disease](/Traits.aspx?ID=46), [paralyzed](/Conditions.aspx?ID=28), [poison](/Traits.aspx?ID=126), [unconscious](/Conditions.aspx?ID=38)

**Resistances**
slashing 5, piercing 5

**Weaknesses**
[positive](/Traits.aspx?ID=128) 5

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

**Speed** 20 feet, climb 20 feet, swim 20 feet

**Melee**
<actions string="Single Action" />
fleshy slap +14 ([Forceful](/Traits.aspx?ID=180)),
**Damage** 2d6+8 bludgeoning plus [Grab](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=18)

**Ranged**
<actions string="Single Action" />
bone shard +11 ([Agile](/Traits.aspx?ID=170), [range increment 20 feet](/Traits.aspx?ID=248), [versatile P](/Traits.aspx?ID=200)),
**Damage** 1d8+8 bludgeoning

**Sapping Squeeze** <actions string="Single Action" />  **Requirements** The shanrigol has a creature [grabbed](/Conditions.aspx?ID=20); **Effect** The shanrigol squeezes the life essence from its target, dealing 1d6+5 bludgeoning and 1d4 [persistent bleed damage](/Conditions.aspx?ID=29) (DC 18 basic Fortitude save). The shanrigol regains temporary Hit Points equal to half the amount of bludgeoning damage a single target takes; these temporary Hit Points last for 1 minute.

**Shred Flesh**   A shanrigol rips flesh away from targets in great chunks. Creatures critically hit by the shanrigol's fleshy slap Strike take an additional 1d6 [persistent bleed damage](/Conditions.aspx?ID=29) and are [enfeebled 1](/Conditions.aspx?ID=13) for as long as they are bleeding.

**Undulating Step** <actions string="Two Actions" />  The shanrigol separates its flesh from its bones to fit through small spaces. It Strides, ignoring difficult terrain and fitting through tight spaces as though it were a Tiny creature. It can't use any actions other than Undulating Step until it occupies an area large enough for its normal form.

</column>
